Project
Major Project (12st Feb - 21st May, 2015)
(Structural & Vibrational Analysis of Aircraft Wings) at (SISTec, Bhopal)
Description: The Project deals with the different stacking angles of composite materials used in making aircraft wings
The Project consists of 3D-modelling, Node meshing and analysis on ANSYS.
This analysis results in reduction of fluttering speed of Aircraft Wings.
Minor Project (1st March-31st March, 2014)
(Power Generation Through Low Heat Source) at (SISTec, Bhopal)
Description:
Only one time feeding is required in the power plant.
The power plant could generate electricity for long period till any leakage does not occur in it.
The source used for providing heat to the working fluid is easily available and heating sources can be those which uses renewal sources of energy.
